comments:
Using Mac OS X 10.3.8

Correction: This bug is in version 3.0.2 but there is no Version choice for that
here in bugzilla.

It looks like I have been able to work around this by creating a new workspace
and copying projects of .metadata/.plugins/org.eclipse.core.resources/.projects
over.

I now consider that this issue is more of the error message being rather
unhelpful, at least to me, so I'm lowering the sevrity to minor. It's more than
possible that someone with more experience would be able to tell just what went
wrong from the error.

Is that the only information in your log file?  Please attach the entire
workspace/.metadata/.log file if still available.  The NoClassDefFoundError was
likely caused by the owning plugin (org.eclipse.core.resource) failing to start.
 That fail should also be recorded in the log.
